attributes.action: Products should be clearly marked if  tested on animals
attributes.additional_details: Testing on animals for cosmetics,  beauty products and cleaning products is unnecessary and widely abhorred in the UK.  However testing is making its return unbekown to the general public.  This petition is to clearly mark (on the product packaging) exactly what products ARE tested on animals.  When we know what these products are, then we can make an informed choice whether or not to buy them.
